article_title: Traffic Boxes To Be Wrapped In Artwork By Middle School Students
article_text:
Sioux Falls, SD

You may notice some new artwork popping up in and around a Sioux Falls neighborhood Saturday.

The Whittier Residents Association and the Clean Slate Group are coming together to transform traffic signal boxes in the Whittier neighborhood by covering them with artwork by Whittier Middle School students.

Students were encouraged to submit artwork for the boxes in a continued effort to beautify the neighborhood. The artwork will be laminated with graffiti-resistant material to encourage keeping the artwork clean and vibrant.

The artwork goes up Saturday on traffic boxes along Cliff Avenue and Sixth Street.

The artwork goes up Saturday on traffic boxes along Cliff Avenue and Sixth Street.
Students were encouraged to submit artwork for the boxes in a continued effort to beautify the neighborhood.
